version_description: - Uygulama genelinde iyileştirmeler yapıldı.
- Uygulama genelinde iyileştirmeler yapıldı.

- Araç çeşitlerine manuel vitesli araçlar eklendi.

- Uygulama kullanım deneyimini güçlendirecek uyarı/bilgiler eklendi, düzenlemeler yapıldı.

* Artık araçların temizliğini puanlayabiliyor, senden önce kullanan kişinin aracı nasıl kullandığını bize iletebiliyorsun.
* Ve tabii ki sistemsel geliştirmeler yapıldı.
* Kullanıcı deneyiminde iyileştirmeler yapıldı.
Daha iyi bir müşteri deneyimi sunmak için küçük değişiklikler yapıldı.
Daha iyi bir müşteri deneyimi sunmak için küçük değişiklikler yapıldı.

Güzel haberlerimiz var
Varan 1: Herkes MOOV’lasın diye, artık GarentaDAY şubelerinden de sözleşmeyi imzalayıp kolayca MOOV’layabilirsin.
Varan 2: Çok sevdim ayrılamıyorum bütün gün beraber olalım diyorsan, MOOV’un günlük kira bedelini uygulama üzerinden artık görebilirsin. Mesele sevenler ayrılmasın

Be cool bro!
Now with radar option everything is under your control! Set your radar, don’t miss the cars nearby you.

We removed everything which is unnecessary. With the simplified homepage, the application is even more MOOVER friendly.
We use every way to reach you, we are expanding our fleet, updating our app, publishing ads and having lots of meetings.
Whatever this is not our topic… We have updated Contact Us page so that you can reach us easily!

Service area update.

We keep working! Our airport processes have not changed; it is still very practical and free but we updated our information page.
Our other improvement is that we will ask you to upload photos from 4 angles when you finish your rental.

We keep working! Our airport processes have not changed; it is still very practical and free but we updated our information page.
Our other improvement is that we will ask you to upload photos from 4 angles when you finish your rental.

Our attention is on you! We inspired by your feedback and we developed our digital membership process as easy and intelligible.
We have good news fort he people who wants to see the membership agreement document without get lost in obsolete documents. Now you can reach your membership agreeement easily under my account.
The MOOVER who has debt balace, cant have rental process anymore. But you can pay your debt instantly and continue your rental process.

We said ISPARKs are free for all MOOVERs, we couldn't prevent ourselves and we marked the ISPARK points one by one on our map. Moreover; during your active rental, you can also get directions to your navigation application by clicking the ISPARK points on the map.
Friendship wins! The one who invited his friend is also winning now!

Minor updates for the perfect user experience
Minor updates for the perfect user experience
Minor updates for the perfect user experience
New interface, new application, 3 cities in one! Moreover, it comes with advanced radar, map filtering and advantageous package purchase features.

We have worked hard, fixed many bugs! A few examples:

       -       The filtering process has been improved.
The problem of vehicles not showing up has been solved.
The process of creating a Payment Method has been simplified.

To be continued…

Ladies and gentlemen here is the Featured Car!Know that a small task and discount await you in the vehicle where you see the star icon of the Featured Car. There are two tasks, one is to walk to the vehicle a little further away (which is beneficial to your health) and sometimes to get fuel from Petrol Office.
Also some bug fixes.

We have a good news and even a better one for you. You decide which one is better. From now on, 3 minutes for the time it takes to finalize your rental is free!
And brand new Featured Cars are waiting for you with their small tasks and various ranges. For more details, you can check the Featured Cars page in the menu.

Improvements in the formation of your Payment Methods and in-app dept payment tool is ready for all the MOOVERs!
